column1: 1. "A smile is the universal welcome."
2."Every day may not be good, but there's something good every day."
3."You are enough just as you are.
4.You are perfect."
5. "The best way to predict your future is to create it."
6. "Today is a new beginning, a chance to be happy and healthy.
7. "Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions."
8. "You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream."
9. "In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity."
10. "Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life."
11. You can do it.
12. Nothing is impossible.
13."You are stronger than you know."
14. "Every storm eventually runs out of rain."
15. "You've survived 100% of your worst days."
16. "Your story isn't over yet; keep writing."
17. "You are worth the fight."
18. "You are not alone in this battle."
19. "You are the author of your own story."
20. "Believe in yourself, even when no one else does."
21.The darkest nights produce the brightest stars."
22. "You are not defined by your struggles, but by how you overcome them."
23. "Your strength is greater than your pain."
24. "The sun will rise, and so will you."
25. "Even the darkest hour has only 60 minutes."
26. "You are a warrior, not a victim."
27. "Healing may take time, but it's worth the journey."
28. "You are capable of more than you know."
29. "Keep fighting; your comeback is always stronger than your setback."
30. "You've got this."
31. "Keep going."
32. "Your strength is endless."
33. "This too shall pass."
34. "Believe in yourself."
35. You are resilient.
36. "Choose joy."
37. "Positive thoughts, positive life."
38. "Smile, even on tough days.
39. "Every day is a fresh start."
40. "Radiate positivity."
41. "Your energy is contagious."
42. "Every day is a new beginning."
43. "Embrace the beauty of now."
44. "Inhale courage, exhale doubt."
45. "Breathe in, breathe out, and let go."
46. "Find peace in the present moment."
47. "Renew your spirit with each sunrise."
48. "Rebirth begins within."
49. "Today, let go of what doesn't serve you."
50." Awaken to a new you."
51. Release the past; welcome the future."
52. "Your smile can light up the world."
53. "A positive mindset can change everything."
54. "Today is a gift; that's why it's called the present."
55. "You deserve to be happy."
56. "Laugh more, worry less."
57. The life is worth living even if it's for a moment
58. Do you know how beautiful you are with big smile on your face.
59. Trust me buddy, your smile melts the world .
60. Don't stuck with problems just laugh to let it go.
61. I wish success in a epidemic prevention.
62. Do not give the past the power to define your future.
63. Be proud of who you are, instead of ashamed of how someone else sees you.
64. Crying doesn't mean that you're weak. ...
65. Don't dwell on those who hold you down. ...
66. Never, ever, ever, ever, ever give up on yourself.
67. I actually cry from joy when I think about how happy I am.
68. "If you are depressed, you are living in the past. ...
69. "I need one of those long hugs where you kind a forget whatever else is happening around you for minute." - ...
70. "If you know someone who's depressed, please resolve never to ask them why. ...
71. "I understand your pain. ...
72. "Take a shower, wash off the day.
73. "Better to trip with the feet than with the tongue."
74. "The world was not big enough for Alexander the Great, but a coffin was."
75. "To improve is to change, so to be perfect is to have changed often."
76. "The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams."
77."To get something you never had, you have to do something you've never done."
78. "I'll be okay just not today, and probably not tomorrow."
79. "You will never understand the hell I feel inside my head."
80. "Tough times don't last, but tough people do.
81. "You are capable of amazing things."
82. "Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it."
83. "Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations."
84. "The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."
85. "You are the sky; everything else is just the weather."
86. "Life is about making an impact, not making an income."
87. "The best way to predict the future is to create it."
88. "The sun himself is weak when he first rises and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on."
89. "The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible."
90."Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful."
91. "The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it."
92. "Positivity is a superpower."
93. "Fall seven times, stand up eight."
94. "Life is tough, but so are you."
95. "You can't control everything; sometimes you just need to relax and have faith that things will work out."
96."The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today."
97. "Be present. It's the only moment that matters."
98. "Peace begins with a smile."
99. "Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions."
100. "You have the power to calm the storms of your mind."
101."If you fell down yesterday, stand up today."
102. The only way to do great work is to love what you do."
103. "Believe you can, and you're halfway there."
104. Don't give up on yourself."
105. "Joy can be found in small moments."
106. "You have the power to create happiness."
107. "Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you."
108. "You are a unique and irreplaceable soul."
109. "Life is a roller coaster; hold on tight."
110. "The world is a better place with you in it."
111. "You are worthy of self-compassion and self-love."
112. Rainbows follow the storm."
113."Your dreams are worth pursuing."
114. "You are a fighter, not a quitter."
115. "In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity."
116. "Your worth is not determined by your productivity."
117. "You are a diamond; they can't break you."
118. "You are not defined by your past."
119. "Embrace the journey, even the challenges."
120."You are loved, even when you can't feel it."
